name: Puerto Rican Zombies
description: Have fun with this fun game killing zombies in Puerto Rican style, 12 levels of pure fun, you can not allow the zombies to reach the end, you have to wait for the coqui to take 3 times the flag of Puerto Rico to the beautiful girl and go to the next level , Each level will be more complicated and with many more zombies, you can play in your phone or tablet,Excellent graphics and sound, you dare to reach the end?
